name: TokeniserTest
description: Unit tests for the Tokeniser class in the Jsoup library, focusing on handling large inputs and specific character entities.

test_cases.name: bufferUpInAttributeVal
test_cases.description: Tests the handling of large attribute values in HTML parsing.

test_cases.name: handleSuperLargeTagNames
test_cases.description: Tests the handling of very large tag names in HTML parsing.

test_cases.name: handleSuperLargeAttributeName
test_cases.description: Tests the handling of very large attribute names in HTML parsing.

test_cases.name: handleLargeText
test_cases.description: Tests the handling of large text content in HTML parsing.

test_cases.name: handleLargeComment
test_cases.description: Tests the handling of large comment content in HTML parsing.

test_cases.name: handleLargeCdata
test_cases.description: Tests the handling of large CDATA content in HTML parsing.

test_cases.name: handleLargeTitle
test_cases.description: Tests the handling of large title content in HTML parsing.

test_cases.name: cp1252Entities
test_cases.description: Tests the parsing of specific CP1252 entities.

test_cases.name: cp1252EntitiesProduceError
test_cases.description: Tests that parsing specific CP1252 entities produces an error.

test_cases.name: cp1252SubstitutionTable
test_cases.description: Tests the CP1252 substitution table for character encoding.

test_cases.name: canParseVeryLongBogusComment
test_cases.description: Tests the parsing of a very long bogus comment in HTML.

test_cases.name: canParseCdataEndingAtEdgeOfBuffer
test_cases.description: Tests the parsing of CDATA content ending at the edge of the buffer.
